abstract: The directors Chris Hegedus and D. A. Pennebaker call their new political documentary “The Return of the War Room.” But the political strategists who inhabited that fabled room — the one where, in 1992, Bill Clinton’s upstart presidential campaign was waged — never really left.

lead_paragraph: The directors Chris Hegedus and D. A. Pennebaker call their new political documentary “The Return of the War Room.” But the political strategists who inhabited that fabled room — the one where, in 1992, Bill Clinton’s upstart presidential campaign was waged — never really left.
